website_summaries.verdict: Compared to professional-grade fog machines, this extravagant product can help you host almost any event.
pros: Can simulate a CO2-style effect by adding the proper fog fluids
Comes with built-in lights capable of specialized programming
Registers the included remote from far distances
cons: Thickness of fog sometimes hides the lights
Some customers complain about the machine's noise level

customer_reviews.title: Super reliable, dramatic effects!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another fog machine a couple Halloweens ago, but even new it just couldn't keep up. I splurged on the "Fog Fury" this year and was blown away by how well it works! Combined with the integral LED lighting, the effects are awesome and dramatic. Some day I might learn to take advantage of the DMX capabilities, but for now the included remote control works great! There are four programmable buttons on the remote for different color combinations on demand. To create a denser effect, I placed the Fog Fury inside a garbage can so the fog and lighting would appear even thicker. It scared the pants off the Trick-or-Treaters when I blasted the fog as they walked by.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Abell

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fog machine to go with my Halloween decorations. I have my lights programmed to have a bit of fire theme, when I saw the promo video, I knew this is something I had to have. I had visions of mounting it above my front entryway so it would shoot down as trick or treaters approached, but when you flip the reservoir it kind of needed more clearance than I had available. Instead I set it up behind a pillar angled about 45 degrees so it would blast across the walkway. I programmed the remote channels to appropriate colors, and fire it as the kids passed it. This thing is awesome! The reactions made this worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Example: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best machine I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have bought at least a dozen or so fog machines in the past. This is by far the best machine I have ever used. It is very responsive, registers remote presses from at least 30 feet away, and jets fog out like nobody's business up to about 10 feet from the device when outside. ADJ has killed my desire for any other brand in this field. Great, tough construction throughout the device. Multiple ways to prop it up, or hang it sideways and even upside down. More color patterns than I know what to do with. And the machine stays relatively cool after hours of use. If I could give it 6 stars, I would. Awesome, awesome, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Koda Pgz

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far - but why no amber/red color option?
customer_reviews.text: Just got this to replace my trusty Chauvet Geyser Jr. Works well so far and looks great! My biggest complaint so far is that there is no option to use the awesome amber with red for a fire color - you have 64 "color macros" to choose from, but none of them have amber and red together (only washed out with a ton of blue or green.) Come on guys! You built a flamethrower, give it the color it deserves! (Talking about the remote control options, I'm not interested in using DMX just to get the right color - other reviews mention problems with DMX control anyway.)
customer_reviews.author: DJ Purple

customer_reviews.title: Used for testing smoke detectors
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smoke machine that produced abundant smoke for ceiling mounted (and duct mounted) smoke detector testing. Speed was essential since the local fire marshal had time expectations for alarm performance. This machine could set off a detector in around 30 seconds. Also, I was concerned about stinking up a new building with liquid smoke. Not a problem at all. Word of caution, make sure you bring substantial fans with you to clear out the smoke. I put so much smoke in three adjacent rooms that it took 30 minutes to clear them even with fans blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason from Muscle Shoals

customer_reviews.title: Fog Machine
customer_reviews.text: I use this for Fire Alarm systems testing. Puts out plenty of fog for testing smoke control system testing. When holding the one button it will turn off after a little bit, I'm assuming it gets hot and has to cool down. You wait about a minute and back to producing fog. Overall it's a really nice unit. Make sure you unplug the remote before transporting to make sure you don't damage the remote port on the back of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: JRDowty

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: If you have seen this jett pro on video or youtube...its NOT played up, this thing will put a strong, thick "Jett" stream of fog out. As easy as plug and play as you can get. No programing required for basic ops which provides 4 different colors, but with a few mins reading the instructions you can program many features into the unit. I purchased this one for a trade show "attention getter". I need a visual influencer that get high into the convention center and this will do it. Thinking about buying a second one only because I like to have pairs of everything.
customer_reviews.author: AlumaReel USA

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: The heating element went out after 4 months. It worked great until that.
customer_reviews.author: Gagemu

customer_reviews.title: So Good!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only use regular smoke machines before and this is such a fun twist. We use it as a volcano burst in a game we created. I love that you can control the duration of the blast and the light colors and effects. I only got it a week ago so it hasn't been used long but it seems perfect.
customer_reviews.author: EscapeQueen

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Won't work unless you have thumb on button, no automation, worked for 30 min then broke brand new out of box, very disappointed, total waste of $. My party would have been ruined had I not also bought the Chauvet 1301, which saved the day
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Super cool that it lights up and has a remote. I did not anticipate that it would be SO loud though.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Powerful geyser!
customer_reviews.text: We have several different brands of geyser lights and this one is by far the most powerful. I love that it has a DMX connector so we can just hook it up to our light board.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, used it multiple times, the burst isn't long, but it heats up quick and is ready to go!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank the Tank

customer_reviews.title: Gotta get you one.
customer_reviews.text: My geyser finally gave out on my after 6 years. I’m a mobile dj and no longer wanted the geyser effect. I already had the smaller fury for my Small gigs and figured the 3000 way too big. This one is perfect. Blows hard strong and long. Takes a little to warm up. About 4-5 minutes. But once it ready. It’s ready.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R.

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, i love this machine.. Im in the djing professional. i use this for the first time at my event it wowed the crowd and myself. The combination of lights and fog was totally awesome..But i set the smoke detector off, lol. Other than that this machine is great....
customer_reviews.author: S Greene

customer_reviews.title: Works great ordered two of them
customer_reviews.text: Works great ordered two of them. one was damaged. Seller makes getting a replacement easy and hassle free. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Quality equipment
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed. 8 min warm up then available on command. Used in escape room and dramatic effect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R. Siegrist

customer_reviews.title: Really great fog machine for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. The thickness of the fog is very dense and fills a small room in a matter of seconds. The warmth of the fog is not noticeable especially when I used it for a product shoot.
customer_reviews.author: David Le

customer_reviews.title: Worked in DMX mode only.
customer_reviews.text: Tested unit at our venue. Unit did not work with wireless remote in any mode, a-d. It did work in DMX mode. Returning unit.
customer_reviews.author: Turtletraxx

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fog machine - works as advertised I did have to replace the battery in the remote
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Fast Fog
customer_reviews.text: This fog machine is great if you want a rapid atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this machine. Takes 8 minutes to warm up, runs for 2 minutes then takes another 4 minutes to warm back up. I've seen much better machines which have continuous flow.
customer_reviews.author: james e holtz

customer_reviews.title: Great seller! Great value, prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Great seller! Great value, prompt delivery. Fog machine works really well. Very powerful and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment that our High School Theater Department has ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Best investment that our High School Theater Department has ever made! I have purchased things before and been disappointed. I am happy to say that this product has exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bruin

customer_reviews.title: Great little geysers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome geyser! Great streams of intense fog and with the DMX included, definitely a huge benefit over the $100 more rival by chauvet. I'd give it 5 stars but the reservoir tank had a micro slash in the plastic cause a slow, but steady drip. By the time I realized it was leaking was when I returned to the warehouse to see the reservoir tank was completely empty. Not really anyone's fault, just a defect in the production line where it inadvertently got cut to spring the leak. Don't hesitate to buy it, well worth every penny! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: nnittoli

customer_reviews.title: Great effect !
customer_reviews.text: Rock n roll shows. These add so much! Everybody loves the effect!
customer_reviews.author: melissa hyerstay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been perfect, not a bad price either
customer_reviews.author: M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Our 2nd one!
customer_reviews.text: Give really good special effects in our Laser Tag arena Definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adj fog fury
customer_reviews.text: thats one of the best fog machines i have ever purchase
customer_reviews.author: linus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, used 2 f these for smoke for football ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, used 2 f these for smoke for football team, put out lots of smoke in a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This baby rocks does exactly what they say it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic smoke effect jet
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic smoke effect jet. Easy to set up and use and loads of fun. Needed to dilute the fog liquid with distilled water due to very large fog output. The only surprise with the unit is that it is very load when it goes off. This is sometimes nice but can frighten dancers.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan's Amazon Input

customer_reviews.title: Great effect for fire and explosions
customer_reviews.text: Great effect. Shoots fog more than 15 feet. Remote works from at least 50 feet away in our theater. We bought this to replace flash pots. While it is not the same effect as a flash pot it still got great reaction from the audience. We have used it several times now for various shows. The only complaint is when mounted overhead it spits on the actors. After the blast was finished it would drip onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: bsanker

customer_reviews.title: My client LOVED them.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for an event and they really helped to set the tone for the event. My client LOVED them.
customer_reviews.author: SAK

product_meta.title: ADJ Products Fog Fury, JETT Stream COLR,12X3W RGB
product_meta.description: Size:JettCreate powerful plumes of fog with the Fog Fury Jett. This vertical fog machine is easy to mount in multiple directions with the interchangeable fluid tank which allows the Fog Fury Jett to produce fog upward, downward or horizontally. Better yet, the Fog Fury Jett features built-in RGBA LED color mixing with manual, remote or DMX control to easily produce lighted colored fog effects without the need for additional fixtures. Built to last, the Fog Fury Jett is the vertical fog solution you've been looking for.
feature_bullets: HIGH-VELOCITY VERTICAL FOG MACHINE: This powerful and efficient fog machine uses advanced heater technology to create bursts of fog up to 25 feet.
BUILT-IN COLOR MIXER: Add color to your fog effect without the need for additional equipment. The Fog Fury Jett utilizes twelve 3W RGBA LED bulbs with DMX capabilities.

SAFE AND RELIABLE: The Fog Fury Jett is a low-maintenance fog machine with built-in safety features like Thermo Sensing Technology to maintain optimum heat levels, Clog Prevention, Safety Loop, and a Low Fluid Indicator.

HANG IN MULTIPLE DIRECTIONS: Create astonishing fog effects in any direction with the versatile Fog Fury Jett which has interchangeable mounting options that make it easy to produce fog up, down or horizontally.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: 700W, Manual, Remote, or DMX control, Included ADJ FFJWR Wireless Remote, 120ml/min consumption rate, 4-button control panel & LCD display on rear panel, 3-pin XLR In/Out, Carry Handle, 120V IEC AC Input, 16lbs, ETL Approved.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
